```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
biology = read.csv("Sugars.csv", sep=",")

for( name in c("C1..C2.", "C2..C3.","C3..O3.", "C1..O4.", "C2..O2.","C4..C5.", "C4..O4.","C5..O5.","C1..C2..C3.", "C1..C2..O2.", "C1..O4..C4.", "C2..C1..O4.", "C2..C3..C4.", "C2..C3..O3.", "C3..C2..O2.", "C3..C2..O2.", "C3..C4.", "C3..C4..C5.", "C3..C4..O4.", "C4..C3..O3.", "C4..C5..O5.", "C5..C4..O4.")){
  print(ggplot(biology, aes_string("Base",name, color=name)) + geom_violin(width = 0.5) )
}
```

```{r}
angles = read.csv("Angle.csv", sep=",")
ggplot(angles, aes(AngleName, Value, fill = AngleName, linetype = Sugar)) + geom_violin(width=2) +ylim(100,120) + coord_polar(theta = "y", direction = -1, start = -pi/2) + theme_minimal() +ylab("Bond angle [°]") + xlab("Angle Notation") + scale_fill_brewer(type="qual", palette=3)
```
